activities: GFY - Good For You(TM), GFE - Good For Enterprise(TM), GD - Good Dynamics (TM), G3 Solution, Good/AppCentral, Good/BoxTone and Good/FixMo are the brand names for Good Technology patented architecture and product suite that provides secure mobile access to corporate data on supported mobile devices as well as MDM support. Good Technology provides its services to the EU businesses and consumers and also delivers brandable mobile applications to wireless operators ("Carriers"). At Good Technology we may collect PII in order to (i) enable access to the Good Mobile Portal for our enterprise customers, and (ii) to provide a limited number of reports to the Carrier or Enterprises for whom the owner of the PII data is a subscriber in accordance with the agreements between Good Technology and such Carrier or Enterprise. We do not share, sell, or lease PII data to any third-parties other than Carriers. We implemented stringent security policy to our Data Center infrastructure in order to ensure privacy and confidentiality of customer data as a part of our continuing commitment to Safe Harbor Principles. Credit card or any other financial data is NOT collected or stored on our servers at the Data Center(s).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
